source/models/SummlyResultModel.js

SummlyResultModel

A Backbone.Model that represents the a single CMap Summly result. A single result is composed of the connection between two pert_inames (a query and a target), the component data that went into computing the summly result, and the statistics of the summly computation

summly_result = new SummlyResultModel();
Barista.Models.SummlyResultModel = Backbone.Model.extend({

defaults

set up defaults for model values

  1. {String} query the query perturbagen (pert_iname), defaults to ""
  2. {String} target the target perturbagen (pert_iname), defaults to ""
  3. {Number} summly_score summarized connectivity score across cell types, defaults to -666
  4. {Number} summly_rank summarized percent rank across cell types, defaults to -666
  5. {Number} specificity fraction of background queries that score/rank higher than the observed connection, defaults to -666
  6. {Object} celllinescores the connectivity map scores in each cell line for the target perturbagen , defaults to {}
defaults: { query: "", target: "", summly_score: -666, summly_rank: -666, specificity: -666, cell_line_scores: {} },

initialize

overides the base model's initialize method to set the model's cid to the summly_id

initialize: function(attributes,options){ this.cid = this.get('target'); var pert_type = this.get('pert_type'); switch(pert_type){ case "trt_cp": this.set({pert_type_label: '<span class="label" style="background-color: #E69F00">SMC</span>'}); break; case "trt_oe": this.set({pert_type_label: '<span class="label" style="background-color: #D55E00">OE</span>'}); break; case "trt_sh": this.set({pert_type_label: '<span class="label" style="background-color: #56B4E9">KD</span>'}); break; default: this.set({pert_type_label: '<span class="label">' + pert_type + '</span>'}); } } });
